channel.title: Ponder
channel.description: Ponder is a C++11 reflection library. This is useful for data-driven applications, script binding, automatic editing, etc.

item.title: Start pondering!
item.description:
ponder

  • synonyms: reflect on

Ponder is a fork of CAMP, which reached the end of its life. Ponder 1.0 keeps the same API as CAMP, but makes some changes, like removing the Boost dependency, instead using C++11 features.

CAMP was originally released, by Tegesoft, under the LGPL licence, but this changed to the MIT licence in version 0.8. Ponder retains the same licence.
